title: Make a Chart
description: Use what you learned about charts to make a custom chart using the penguins.csv dataset. Add and edit the blocks in the tray to create a chart that visualizes the data in a way that is interesting to you.
hint: Drag in the selected column and factor blocks and edit the column header names to match the variables you are interested in. Depending on the chart you may or may not select a factor. Then add the chart generation block to build the chart. Add any customizations you wish to make after the chart is created. You may want to run the program and then make one modification on each run.
